subject: RFQ: Request for Quote on Ball Bearings items
body:
Hello Acme Bearings,
Kindly share a quote for the listed SKUs. For each SKU (SKU-001), include numeric values for: specification (0–1), OTIF (%), payment_timeline (days), and price. Reply in JSON per SKU.
Thanks,
Procurement

subject: RFQ: Request for Quote on Gaskets
body:
Hello Precision Gasket Co,
Kindly share a quote for the listed SKUs. For each SKU, include numeric values for: specification (0–1), OTIF (%), payment_timeline (days), and price. Reply in JSON per SKU.
Thanks,
Procurement
